title: Congratulating the Victor Blue Devils Boys Volleyball Team and Head Coach Dave Wisniewski upon the occasion of capturing the Class A Title
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating  the  Victor  Blue  Devils  Boys
Volleyball Team and Head Coach Dave  Wisniewski  upon  the  occasion  of
capturing the Class A State Championship

WHEREAS,  Excellence  and  success in competitive sports can be achieved
only through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured  by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling  in  them  the  value  of teamwork, encouraging a standard of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS, The Victor Blue Devils Boys Volleyball Team are the  Class  A
Champions; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Victor Blue Devils defeated Section 11's Eastport South
Manor High School 3-1 to gain the first ever New York State Division  II
Championship; and
  WHEREAS,  The  athletic  talent displayed by this team is due in great
part to the efforts of  Coach  Dave  Wisniewski  and  Assistant  Coaches
Kathryn  Fenton  and  Jake  Martin,  skilled  and  inspirational tutors,
respected for their ability to develop potential into excellence; and
  WHEREAS, The team's  overall  record  is  outstanding,  and  the  team
members  were  loyally  and  enthusiastically supported by family, fans,
friends and the community at large; and
  WHEREAS, The hallmarks of the Victor Blue Devils Boys Volleyball Team,
from the opening game of the season to participation  in  the  champion-
ship,  were a brotherhood of athletic ability, of good sportsmanship, of
honor and of scholarship, demonstrating  that  these  team  players  are
second to none; and
  WHEREAS,  Athletically  and academically, the team members have proven
themselves to be an unbeatable combination of talents, reflecting favor-
ably on their school; and
  WHEREAS, Coach Dave Wisniewski has done a superb job in guiding, mold-
ing and inspiring the team members toward their goals; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment, and Coach Dave Wisniewski and his  outstanding  athletes
have  clearly made a contribution to the spirit of excellence which is a
tradition of their school; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate  the  Victor Blue Devils Boys Volleyball Team; its members:
Nicholas Bills, Morgan Bolger, McKay Clawson, James Cooper, Erik Dechow,
Matthew DeLong, Michael Ellison, Nick Glamack,  Erik  Griffin,  Nicholas
Hodownes,  Blair  Hutto,  Christopher  Mahan,  Brandon  McAlees, Jeffrey
McGuinness, Matthew McGuinness, Christopher  Mydosh,  Brannon  Perdicho,
Cory  Phillips,  Mitchel  Segbers,  and Philipp Wacker, and Coaches Dave
Wisniewski, Kathryn Fenton and Jake Martin, on their outstanding  season
and overall team record; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Victor Blue Devils Boys Volleyball Team and to the afore-
mentioned coaches.
